meanings.definition: A buttery, flaky pastry typically eaten for breakfast or as a snack.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, Sarah enjoys warm croissants with her coffee.
meanings.sent2: The bakery down the street sells delicious croissants.
meanings.sent3: When the croissants started dancing in the oven, everyone laughed.
meanings.sent4: The croissants were fluffy clouds of buttery goodness.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked croissants filled the room.

meanings.sent1: Today, I will learn how to bake croissants from scratch.
meanings.sent2: We croissanted our way through the entire batch in no time.
meanings.sent3: He croissanted so many pastries that his friends couldn't keep up.
meanings.sent4: She croissants with precision, creating perfect layers every time.
meanings.sent5: The family gathered around the table to croissant together.
